Title: Requires bus drivers complete a human trafficking recognition training program
Summary: Requires bus drivers complete a human trafficking recognition training program which includes the nature of human trafficking; how human trafficking is defined in law; how to identify someone who is human trafficking; how to identify someone who is a human trafficking victim; and entities to whom a driver may report suspected activity that might constitute human trafficking.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring bus drivers complete a human trafficking recognition training program
